meaning_str.bing:
n. 作用；(演员扮演的)角色；社会角色
网络. 任务；角色表；扮演的角色

作用；(演员扮演的)角色；社会角色
任务；角色表；扮演的角色

角色（戏剧、电影中的）；职责；职能；任务；功能；地位；作用；典型行为；身份；影响程度

1.en: The question of whether China can innovate looms over the country's quest to move beyond its role as the world's factory.
1.cn: 问题是中国能否创新，以实现国家提出的超越“世界工厂”作用的要求。

2.en: The gene's role seems to be to export substances out of the cells that secrete earwax.
2.cn: 该基因可以控制细胞排出物质以分泌耳垢。

3.en: The quality of their care cannot be guaranteed and the role of nursing is often under threat.
3.cn: 质量的服务不能保证和护理方面的作用往往受到威胁。

0.en: All right. Indiana Jones plays no role in the outcome of the story.
0.cn: 奉陪到底，故事结尾印第安纳琼斯毫无作用。

1.en: I do think we're at the dawn of a new space era and it's one where commercial companies play a stronger role.
1.cn: 我认为我们处在一个新太空时代的开端，这个时代商业公司将发挥更大的作用。

2.en: Music and arts have always played the key role in my life, in building relationships, replacing what once was ignorance, fear and hatred, with acceptance, friendship and even love.
2.cn: 音乐与艺术在我生活中，对与他人建立关系一直有很重要的作用，将曾经的无知，恐惧和憎恨变为接受，友谊，甚至是爱。

3.en: So you will not be auditioning for the role of Katy anymore? Against you? Me against you for the role of me?
3.cn: 那么……你不会继续为凯蒂的角色试镜了？和你争？我和你争扮演我的角色？

4.en: Yes, of course I will play the role! I am perfect for everything! Wait. Why did Maya borrow you if you already have the role?
4.cn: 是的，我当然会扮演这个角色！我适合扮演所有角色！等会儿。如果你已经得到这个角色了，玛雅为什么还要绑架你？

5.en: Let's get to the tutorial. Max, you and I are going to role-play.
5.cn: 来开始教学吧，麦克斯，你得跟我角色扮演一下。

6.en: Really? What was the occasion? Date night. We do a little role-playing.
6.cn: 真的吗？为什么穿呀？约会夜。我们玩了一点角色扮演。

7.en: Well, Mom, do you want me to set her free? No, Mama really wants this role.
7.cn: 那么，妈妈，你想让我们把她放了？不想，你妈非常想要这个角色。

8.en: We had heard talk of Fang Zhen, the Red Lotus, taking a role in your empire.
8.cn: 我们听说方正和红莲教的事在宋朝掀起了不小波澜。

9.en: The anterior cingulate cortex, which processes surprise, also plays a big role.
9.cn: 脑中的用来处理意外的前扣带回，它也扮演了很重要的角色。

10.en: And as the nation's leading beverage company, we have played an important role.
10.cn: 身为美国首屈一指的饮料公司，我们扮演着重要的角色。

11.en: What? You want me to drive? Yeah. It's time my boy had a proper role in the gang?
11.cn: 啊，什么？你让我开车？对。我儿子终于可以大显身手了。

12.en: All of us, citizens, leaders, the media have a responsibility and a role to play.
12.cn: 我们所有的公民，领袖，媒体都有责任，并且需要扮演自己的角色。

13.en: This is something I long ago came to Peace with in my role as the beta male. Open.
13.cn: 很久以前，当我陷入爱河的时候我是可以打开的，快开。

14.en: I agree, Gil. You do? I do think it's time Steve step out of his current role, yes.
14.cn: 我同意，吉尔。你确定？我确实在想是时候让史蒂夫脱离他现有的角色了，是的

15.en: Where did the cell get the energy to do all this? That's the role of the mitochondria.
15.cn: 细胞在哪里找来能量去做这些事情？那是线粒体的功能。

16.en: I think he may need black male role models. Men who can show him who he might grow into.
16.cn: 我觉得他需要黑人男性榜样。让他知道长大后能成为什么样子的人。

17.en: I assume you're deep cover back in London but isn't this taking the role a little too far.
17.cn: 我以为你的职责是留守伦敦，现在你好像有点越界。

18.en: Riley, explain the role of uranium in nuclear fission. I don't know. Yeah, you're a threat.
18.cn: 莱丽，解释一下铀在核裂变时的角色。我不知道。就你这样还能威胁到我啊。

19.en: There is only one person in the world who could play this role! I know. Anastasia Boulangerie!
19.cn: 在这个世界上只有一个人能演好这个角色！我知道。安娜斯塔西娅·布朗热里！
